Kinder does have vowel-focused standard: Associate the long and short sounds with the common spellings for the five major vowels. (RF.K.3.b) but with final -e and vowel teams explicitly called out in 1st, it's a stretch. #elachat #scienceofreading #CommonCore (4/5)
But those skills are aligned to the *FIRST GRADE* standard: Know final -e and common vowel team conventions for representing long vowel sounds. (RF.1.3.c) #elachat #scienceofreading #CommonCore (3/5)
